segments.text: I see the boy climbing on the stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is wobbly and might tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are being quite clever, but also risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious watching the boy balance like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink adds to the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a scene full of potential accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they will get away with taking the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
